entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few flurries beginning this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
